summary: THE VEHICLE'S TAILGATE GLASS EXPLODED WHILE THE CONSUMER ATTEMPTED TO CLOSE IT.  THE DEALER WAS NOTIFIED.   *NLM   BROKEN LIFTGATE GLASS AND WIPER MOTOR AND ARM WERE REPLACED.  THERE WERE SQUEAKS WHEN GOING OVER BUMPS.  SWAY BAR BUSHINGS REPLACED.  IGNITION SWITCH HARD TO INSERT KEY AT TIMES.  CYLINDER AND TUMBLER REKEYED.  BOTTOM DOOR MOLDING (PASSENGER SIDE) PEELING OFF.  RUBBER GROMMET ON ANTENNA BASE OFF.  RESECURED RUBBER GROMMET FOR ANTENNA BASE.            *TT  PE04045_PCO
